BoxSrv are humans!. We always enjoy providing a solid and reliable services to clients from around the globe, our support is something we are well known for.

Checkout our why us page for why we are the best choice!

Providing hosting services for over 3 years, we know what it takes to keep our clients happy and provide a true reliable service with fast support.
We provide something different, a decent service, something we are known for, our support is one of the fastest around, with ticket replies almost instant through out the day and night!

You can even drop us a call and we will answer!

Great uptime is the key to our success, that is why we maintain a 99.9% uptime!

Questions?

How long have you been operating?
We have been around for just about 3 years now and have proven to be a success on the web.

Uptime?
Our servers have great uptime, we groom our network providers with a blunt attitude to downtime, you don't
want it, we don't, uptime is key! That is why we rarely have any outages!

Great but... Are they oversold?
Indeed we do take a tour here: VPS Control panel tour

Do you offer a control panel?
No, simple. Our prices are at a rate calculated to not oversell and always leave room to grow, most of our
users can verify this, we keep Nodes fast, it is our aim!

Setup time

Orders are manually checked, setup time is usually up to 30 minutes if that.

We look forward to working with you!


See you soon!
